QUOTE: May not satify audit requirements, but many US entities have accounts
CONTEXT: This quote, part of a discussion on moving positions for quarter-end reporting, explicitly acknowledges that a proposed method may not be acceptable to auditors.

QUOTE: AA will be sensitive to us making that transfer into the investment company in the quarter that we have booked earnings on the investment(s) as merchant investments.
CONTEXT: This statement reveals awareness that the auditors (AA, likely Arthur Andersen) would scrutinize the timing of an asset transfer designed to book earnings within a specific quarter.

QUOTE: Enron Venture Capitalism You have two cows. You sell three of them to your publicly listed company, using letters of credit opened by your brother-in-law at the bank... The annual report says the company owns eight cows, with an option on one more.
CONTEXT: This widely circulated internal joke accurately and cynically describes complex and potentially fraudulent financial engineering involving related parties and deceptive accounting.

QUOTE: In my continued discussions with the financial community yesterday and today, it became clear that this move was required to restore investor confidence. Andy Fastow will be on a leave of absence from the company.
CONTEXT: This quote from the Chairman's company-wide announcement explicitly states the CFO is being removed to address a collapse in investor confidence.

QUOTE: Why is this trade being done out of this entity and not Enron Corp like the others?
CONTEXT: An external counterparty (Goldman Sachs) directly questions the use of an unknown Enron entity for a trade, indicating suspicion about the company's opaque corporate structure.
